page.title: 16THINGS IN FASHION
page.content: In the middle of 1985 the latest fashion teenage girls is{rolled up {jeans}. Jeans are a type of trousers made from a strong blue material. {Bat wing jumpers }have got a piece of material that reaches from your wrists to your waists . It therefore looks similar to a bat's wing . {Ankle boots}are boots that go up to your ankle getting baggy at the top. The fashion colours are red and white. {Hair clips}are also worn. These are pieces of coloured plastic that grip your hair. When you squeeze them they look like a butterfly's wing.
